name: Apocalypse Mechanism
description: The Angel descends，cleaning of human. For survival，human became giants too in our armor, Soul Force its beating heart. The last war shall begin.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: SSD recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: SSD recommended
